task.summary: Using different layout in landscape and portrait for movie details
Code cleaned up + using 3 columns on portrait layout

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/ojiofong/MovieApp
# Conflicts: # README.md
Fixed crash if there's no internet
Added favorite selection to multi pane

MESSAGE.value: Using different layout in landscape and portrait for movie details
Code cleaned up + using 3 columns on portrait layout

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/ojiofong/MovieApp
# Conflicts: # README.md
Fixed crash if there's no internet
Added favorite selection to multi pane
RecyclerView getItemViewType used for Movie Details View
Using fixed layout dimens for poster Image View Using scaleType fitxy some code clean ups

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: some code clean ups
